page.title: 10Grampound Playgroup
page.content: The playgroup is run in the village hall and it is for children under 4 and a half.There are about 15 children who go to it at the moment.It starts at 9.30 and finishes at 12.00.When the children arrive they play games and play with toys like tractors and plastic trailers.After that they make pictures and models.The mums cut the things out and the children stick them on.If the children do paintings they do it all themselves.After they have finished that they go out into the recreation field to play with balls and running around catching each other.While the children and some adults are in the recreation field some other mums clean up all the paints and all the mess the children have made.When the children come in again they sit down on the floor and have some milk and then go home.
